desc: SoundDecor U.S.A. sells acoustic products and home decor products mainly to DIY'ers focused on improving sound quality and the looks of their projects. Natural wooden wall panels and printed PET felt wall panels for improving design in homes, recording studios, churches, home theaters, and much more.

layout.text: Sound Decor U.S.A. carries products focused on improving sound quality and interior design for the Do-It-Yourself customer. Our products are perfect in home interiors, home recording studios, home theaters, listening rooms, and more!
